message: Let's start fair. Take 10% and I'll keep the rest.  We can always negotiate later.
I think we should aim for a more even split. Let's go with 90/10 in my favor this time.  We can still work towards a more equitable outcome in the future.

I'm willing to compromise, but 90/10 is too much. Let's split the difference and go with 55/45 in your favor. This way we can both get a decent share, and we still have room to negotiate if we want to adjust it further down the line.
